markdownDescription:
**execDepends**  
List of software dependencies required by the asset or app. Each item must be an object specifying at least `name`, and may include other fields such as `package_manager`, `version`, `stages`, `url`, `tag`, `destdir`, `build_commands`.

If your program relies on packages that must be present in the system to run, specify them here.
- **Basic APT package**: `{"name": "samtools"}`
- **APT package with version and limited to 'work' stage**: `{"name": "bedtools", "version": "2.16.1-1", "stages": ["work"]}`
- **Git repository**: `{"name": "dx-toolkit", "package_manager": "git", "url": "https://github.com/dnanexus/dx-toolkit.git", ... }`
- **Language-specific package managers**: `{"name": "pysam", "package_manager": "pip", ... }` etc.

name.description: Name of the dependency package. For example, 'samtools' for a basic APT package, or 'pysam' for a Python package.
name.markdownDescription:
**Name**  
Name of the dependency package.
- **Examples**  
  - For `apt`: `samtools`
  - For `pip`: `pysam`
  - For `cpan`: `Bio::SeqIO`

package_manager.description: The package manager to use for installing the dependency. Use 'apt' for system packages, 'pip' for Python, 'git' for repositories, 'cran' for R, 'gem' for Ruby, and 'cpan' for Perl.
package_manager.markdownDescription:
**Package Manager**  
The package manager to use for installing the dependency.
- `apt`: System package (e.g., `samtools`, `bedtools`)
- `pip`: Python package (e.g., `pysam`)
- `git`: Git repository (e.g., `dx-toolkit`)
- `cran`: R package (e.g., `plyr`, `ggplot2`)
- `gem`: Ruby package (e.g., `bio`)
- `cpan`: Perl package (e.g., `Bio::SeqIO`)
markdownEnumDescriptions: `apt`: Install using the Advanced Package Tool (APT) for Ubuntu. [APT Docs](https://wiki.debian.org/apt)
`pip`: Install using Python's package manager (pip). [pip Docs](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/)
`git`: Clone from a Git repository. [Git Docs](https://git-scm.com/doc)
`cran`: Install from the Comprehensive R Archive Network (CRAN). [CRAN Docs](https://cran.r-project.org/manuals.html)

version.description: Specific version of the package to install (optional). For example, '2.16.1-1' for a specific version of bedtools.
version.markdownDescription:
**Version**  
Specific version of the package to install (optional).
- Example: `2.16.1-1` for `bedtools`

stages.description: Stages in which the dependency is required. For example, ['work'] limits installation to only the 'work' entry point. By default, dependencies install for all entry points.
stages.markdownDescription:
**Stages**  
Stages in which the dependency is required.
- Example: `["work"]` limits installation to the 'work' entry point.

url.description: URL to fetch the dependency from (used for git or other sources). For example, a Git repository for dx-toolkit.
url.markdownDescription:
**URL**  
URL to fetch the dependency from (used for git or other sources).
- Example: `https://github.com/dnanexus/dx-toolkit.git` for a Git repository.

tag.description: Tag or branch to use when fetching from a VCS (e.g., git). For example, 'master' for the main branch.
tag.markdownDescription:
**Tag**  
Tag or branch to use when fetching from a VCS (e.g., git).
- Example: `master` for the main branch.

destdir.description: Destination directory for installing the dependency. For example, '/opt/dx-toolkit' for a Git repository.
destdir.markdownDescription:
**Destination Directory**  
Destination directory for installing the dependency.
- Example: `/opt/dx-toolkit` for a Git repository.

build_commands.description: Commands to run to build/install the dependency after fetching. For example, 'make install DESTDIR=/ PREFIX=/opt/dnanexus' for building dx-toolkit.
build_commands.markdownDescription:
**Build Commands**  
Commands to run to build/install the dependency after fetching.
- Example: `make install DESTDIR=/ PREFIX=/opt/dnanexus` for building dx-toolkit.

items.markdownDescription:
**Dependency Object**  
Defines a single dependency with required and optional fields.
